title: Shakespeare's Globe Romeo and Juliet iPod
description:
Romeo and Juliet from Shakespeare's Globe Theatre captured from Sky Arts 2.

Dominic DromgooleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 2009 production brings refreshing clarity to one of ShakespeareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most famous and best-loved tragedies, drawing out the contemporary relevance of this passionate teenage love story. Ellie Kendrick, a truly youthful Juliet, and Adetomiwa Edun, a boyish Romeo, head an excellent cast whose period costumes point to the timelessness of parental disapproval, adolescent temperament, rivalry and violence. Filmed before a live audience at ShakespeareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Globe in the heart of London, its intimate and atmospheric setting adds immediacy and vitality to the humour and passion of ShakespeareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s verse.
